full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYI CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,SMRAS PA MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG GSANG BA'I BDAG PO YI, ,SGO NAS NAD GDON DGRA BGEGS BAR CHAD RNAMS, BZLOG CING BSGYUR BA'I CHO GA 'DI LTA BU'I THU SHE KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BYA BA'I MDA' 'BANGS DGE SLONG BLO GROS DANG DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA MNAN CHER GYIS YANG YANG BKSUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG DE'I SLAD DU, GZHAN GYIS BZLOG BSGYUR TSOGS RIGS 'GRE NAS BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN SUG BRIS LA, LHAG CHAD NOR 'KHRUL SOGS NYES CI MCHIS KUN, BLA MA LHA TSOGS BZOD CING DBYES BAR MDZOD, GAL TE LEGS CHA CU ZAD YOD NA DES, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN DANG BSTAN 'DZIN DAR ZHING RGYAS, MA GYUR 'GRO KUN BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHING, TSE RABS KUN TU BLA MAS RJES BZUNG STE, KUN MKHYEN GO 'PHANG THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I 'BANGS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU'I ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O,, ,,BKRA SHIS BAR GYUR CIG , ,,
